lead_paragraph: A picture caption on Sunday with an article about hill-climb cycling competitions misidentified one rider and omitted the name of another shown competing in the Mount Washington Auto Road Bicycle Hillclimb. The cyclist on the left — not the right — was John Sutton, No. 723. The rider on the right, No. 413, who was not named in the caption, was Jonathan Calvert. (The rider in the middle, Hannah Sullivan, was identified correctly.).
